aboutMe: As a 21 year old entrant into the world of full-stack development, I embody a dynamic fusion of creativity, technical acumen, and a passion for collaborative innovation. What got me into coding? I'm fascinated by the intricacies of creation and the journey from conception to execution, finding immense joy in crafting digital solutions that transcend boundaries. Despite my affinity for code, my background as an athlete has instilled in me the discipline and perseverance essential for success, even from behind a desk. A natural people person, I thrive in environments where like-minded individuals converge, fueling each other's growth and pushing boundaries. With an unwavering commitment to continuous learning and a nick for problem-solving, I am poised to make meaningful contributions in the ever-evolving landscape of technology. Let's embark on the the journey of continuous learning and discovery which shapes not only our creations; but ourselves too.

projects.name: Huis Course
projects.description: My capstone final project. Using JavaScript, Bootstrap, HTML, CSS, Node JS and MySql.

projects.description: My first portfolio built with HTML,CSS,Bootstrap and JavaScript.

projects.name: Years to days convertor
projects.description: A simple calculator that converts your age to days. Built with HTML,CSS and JavaScript.

education.description: I successfully completed a Full-stack Web Development course at Life Choices Academy. Throughout the program, I adapted to various workplace environments while mastering multiple programming skills. This experience equipped me with a strong foundation in both front-end and back-end technologies, preparing me to tackle real-world development challenges.
I'm a 2021 Matriculant from South Peninsula High School. My subjects included: Mathematics, English, Afrikaans, Life Orientation, Life Science, History and Business Studies.

skills.name: HTML
skills.level: Proficient in HTML, my skills are at an intermediate level. I'm adept at structuring web content effectively and implementing various HTML elements to create responsive and user-friendly interfaces.

skills.name: CSS
skills.level: My CSS proficiency is at an intermediate level. I have a strong grasp of styling techniques, including selectors, properties, and layout models, allowing me to create visually appealing and responsive designs for web applications.

skills.name: JavaScript
skills.level: I'm currently at an intermediate level in JavaScript, having learned and practiced various concepts. I'm looking forward to deepening my understanding and continuing to apply my knowledge to create more dynamic and efficient web applications.

skills.name: BootStrap
skills.level: I'm now more experienced in Bootstrap and excited to continue exploring its capabilities. With my improved skills, I'm eager to integrate its features into my web development projects, leveraging its pre-built components and responsive design utilities to create dynamic and visually appealing websites.

skills.name: Vue JS
skills.level: I'm currently at a intermediate level with Vue, with understanding of its core concepts. I'm excited to deepen my knowledge and apply what I learn to build more interactive and responsive web applications.

skills.name: Node JS
skills.level: I'm currently at a beginner's level with Node.js, with a bit of understanding of its key concepts. I'm eager to enhance my skills and apply them to build efficient server-side applications, focusing on backend development to create scalable and dynamic solution.

skills.name: MySql
skills.level: I'm currently at a beginner's level with MySQL, with a bit of understanding of its fundamental concepts. I'm excited to further explore its capabilities and apply what I learn to manage and structure data efficiently for web applications.

softSkills.name: Communication
softSkills.description: I excel at effectively conveying ideas and information to others. I'm also a good listener, capable of understanding and responding to the needs of others. I have experience working in teams and collaborating with others to achieve common goals.

softSkills.name: Problem Solving
softSkills.description: I am a natural problem solver, skilled at identifying issues, analyzing possible solutions, and implementing effective strategies to resolve them.

softSkills.name: Time Management
softSkills.description: I am adept at managing my time effectively, prioritizing tasks, and meeting deadlines. I am also a quick learner, able to adapt to new situations and environments, and I am eager to continue developing my skills and knowledge across various fields.

experience.description: I'm currently interning at Life Choices Studio as I pursue my goal of becoming a Full-Stack Developer. Throughout this experience, I've gained valuable workplace experience while actively upskilling and enhancing my programming abilities.
